name: DeathRock
description:
thank you all for trying our game <3
In the future we are going to release new games so stay up-to-date with us.
Game created for the quarantine jam developed in three days

A lot of...Death!

W/A/S/D to move your mini death's robot!

Directs your cursor and press leftmouse to smash all the enemies!

When you see a flashing monster,press rightmouse and see what happens...

DeathRock! Hell Yeah!
